name: Minimum Noise
tag_list: music, music-production, music-collaboration, music-crowdsourcing, crowdsourcing-music, online-music-collaboration
overview:
Minimum Noise is a service that enables musicians to help each other create great music. Need help perfecting your newest hit? Have customised beats, vocals or accompaniments made to match your specifications.

Got production talent? Make money by creating musical parts for other musicians.

Do you need a specific piece of audio for your music, such as vocals with certain characteristics or a beat played on a special set of drums? Simply create a project with your request on Minimum Noise.

Describe the details and state a prize that you are willing to pay for the audio. Producers can now participate in your project, either by uploading actual suggestions to the completed work or examples of previous work to illustrate their style.

When you have found a submission that you like, declare it to be the winner. Transfer the prize to the producer and receive audio material along with all rights to use it.

If you sing, play instruments or have other music production skills, you can put your creative abilities to use and make a profit.

Participate in the projects that fit your talents by uploading audio material that either illustrates your style or suggests a completed version of the requested material.

If the project owner chooses your work, you will receive the prize and transfer the audio material along with all rights to the project owner.
